message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is higher to you, but I'm only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $16,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and our ongoing negotiation. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to consider $14,000 as a compromise. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product to both of us.
